name: Shadow Man's Crazy Delivery Service Xtreme
name_original: Shadow Man's Crazy Delivery Service Xtreme
description:
RUN AROUND A FIND DELIVERIES, DELIVER THEM WITHIN THE  TIME LIMIT, AND GET PAID IN CASH AND PLAYTIME. ANY LIVING THING YOU TOUCH WILL DIE, AND YOU WILL LOSE MONEY! MAKE AS MANY DELIVERIES AND AS MUCH CASH AS POSSIBLE!

NOW GO OUT THERE AND MAKE SOME CRAAAZY MONEY!

Controls:

WASD to move

Shift to sprint

Space to jump

Mouse to look around
